    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String[] args,
                java.io.InputStream stdin,
                java.io.OutputStream stdout)
         throws FindException
        Runs the find application with the specified arguments.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Application
        Parameters:
        args - Array of arguments for the application. Each array element can be a folder name, flag or filename.
        stdin - An InputStream, not used.
        stdout - An OutputStream. The output of the command is written to this OutputStream.
        Throws:
        FindException - If the folder(s)/filename specified do not exist or are unreadable or invalid arguments are given.

      • getArguments

        private java.lang.String getArguments(java.lang.String[] args,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> folderNames)
                               throws FindException
        Get folder names and filename supplied by user.
        Parameters:
        args - supplied by user
        folderNames - folders supplied by user
        Returns:
        a String of the regex of filename if specified by user, else returns an empty string
        Throws:
        FindException - The exception caused by FindApplication

        Return the string listing the names of the matched file/folder in the specified folder.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        fileName - String of a regular expression of the file name
        folderName - Array of String of given folder/folders' name
        Throws:
        FindException

      • findInFolders

        private java.lang.String findInFolders(java.lang.String fileName,
                                       java.lang.String... folderName)
                                throws FindException
        Finds files/folders specified by the user. Folders will be displayed first before files, if in the same nesting level; If folder is not empty, it will be recursively searched and its contents will be displayed before other files in the same nesting level as the folder. Returns all files and folders that matches the fileName specified.
        Parameters:
        fileName - String of a regular expression of the file name
        folderName - Array of String of given folder/folders' name
        Returns:
        the string listing the names of the matched file/folder in the folders specified
        Throws:
        FindException - The exception caused by FindApplication

      • formatResult

        private java.lang.String formatResult(java.util.regex.Pattern filePattern,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listOfFileNames,
                                      java.lang.String folderName)
        Sorts the listOfFileNames and listOfFolder Names in alphabetical order and format the files/folders into the required format.
        Parameters:
        filePattern - regex pattern of specified file, if isFindingFile is true
        listOfFileNames - unsorted list of file names
        folderName - subpath from pwd
        Returns:
        string of all or specified file name(s) concatenated and delimited by a new line character

      • getFilesFrom

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFilesFrom(java.io.File currFolder)
        Pre-condition: currFolder exists
        Parameters:
        currFolder - the folder to list all files
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all the file names
